description: Powerfactory Utils is a toolbox for external use ('engine mode') of the power flow calculation program DIgSILENT PowerFactory. For that, the Python-PowerFactory-API which is provided by the company is utilized.
title: Powerfactory Utils - A toolbox for Python based control of DIgSILENT PowerFactory

creators.name: Institute of Electrical Power Systems and High Voltage Engineering - TU Dresden

notes:
Specific Powerfactory Utils versions can be found in the "Versions" list on the right side of this page.
See the full list of authors on GitHub.
